about.name: Brandon Stevens
about.bio: I am a high school Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer with 6 years of experience in advanced programming and IT, along with over 3 years of experience in electrical engineering. I am currently the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and Co-Founder in a profitable underwater technology startup called DeepWater Exploration.

sections.name: blog
sections.title: Posts
sections.description: Below are my featured blog posts.

sections.name: patents
sections.title: Patents
sections.description: These are the patents I was an inventor of.

cards.name: submersible-camera-for-underwater-vehicles
cards.title: Submersible Camera For Underwater Vehicles
description: **Application Number: 63334108**: A submersible camera designed for underwater vehicles, surface vehicles, etc. The invention is a unique design that utilizes few components, minimal size, low production cost, high depth rating, high reliability, and wide compatibility with systems via an onboard processor.

sections.name: education
sections.title: Education
sections.description: Below is my education and educational accomplishments.

cards.name: cams
cards.title: California Academy of Mathematics and Science (CAMS)
cards.subtitle: Class of 2024
description: The California Academy of Mathematics & Science is a four year application-based public high school seeking to increase the nation's pool of graduates in mathematics and science.

At CAMS, I have connected with an alumni network, amazing teachers, and dedicated STEM students. As CAMS is on the CSUDH Campus, we as students are able to dual enroll in both high school and university as well as community colleges such as LBCC.

sections.name: experience
sections.title: Experience
sections.description: Below is some of my experience.

cards.name: dwe
cards.title: DeepWater Exploration Inc.
cards.subtitle: Chief Product Officer, Co-Founder
description: DeepWater Exploration is a hardware startup that empowers the future of deep-water exploration through the production of high quality components for ROV, AUV, and Marine robotics. [Learn More](https://exploredeepwater.com/pages/about)

While working at DWE, I have gained extensive experience in IOT and Marine Robotics. Using my past knowledge with video streaming, linux devices, and server technologies, I have been able to lead a variety of our software-oriented projects, including a dedicated device driver, streaming application, forums, and documentation. Since I joined the team in September of 2021, we have successfully incorporated with I having created a full suite of software capable of driving sales. Read more about my specific projects in my [blog post](/blog/deepwater-exploration.html).

cards.name: camscsc
cards.title: CAMS Computer Science & Cybersecurity Club
cards.subtitle: President, Former Workshop Director
description: While still in high school, I have been working to develop my school's computer science and cybersecurity programs. I have helped organize events, lead workshops, and design curriculum for students to learn and develop a passion in the field.

cards.name: jetstream
cards.title: JetStream 2710
cards.subtitle: FRC 2710 Member
description: [JetStream FRC#2710](https://jetstream2710.com/) is a community-based FRC team founded in November 2017. Student team members hail from several public and private high schools and home school programs in the South Bay area of Los Angeles. As a small community team, there are many opportunities for involvement and making an impact on the community around us.

cards.name: nerdherd
cards.title: The NerdHerd 687
cards.subtitle: FRC 687 Member
description: I was a member of CAMS FRC for 2 years in my freshman and sophomore year of high school. During my experience, I learned valuable communication skills due to the large size of the team. As a programmer, I worked on the robot code in java.
